participant_1.background:
I made a new friend who is really supportive and helps me chase my dreams.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.
My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake.
i ve a flower garden.
i have more money than i know what to do with.

participant_2.background:
I started a blog on parenting and shared my jokes to cheer people up.
I am not very good at keeping up with my family, but I try my best.
i live with my parents and my little brother.
I enjoy spending my time with my two beagles, Chance and Boomer
I'm curious about the history of the lake near my house.

content.text: Hello! My name is participant_1. What is your name?
Hello! My name is participant_2. It's nice to meet you!
It's nice to meet you too! What are you passionate about?
I'm passionate about parenting and sharing jokes to cheer people up.
That's so great! I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me and helping others chase their dreams.
That's awesome! I'm curious about the history of the lake near my house.
That's cool! I have a lake near my house too. I love spending time there.
Me too! I like to go for walks around it and just relax.
That sounds nice! I like to take pictures of the lake and the flowers in my garden.
That's cool! I like to take pictures of my dogs, Chance and Boomer.
Aww! I love dogs! I wish I had one.
They're great pets! I'm glad I have them.
I'm glad too! It sounds like we have a lot in common.
Yeah! I think we would be good friends.
I think so too! We should hang out sometime.
That would be great! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! Let's do something fun!
We could go to the lake!
That would be awesome! I'll bring my camera.
Perfect! I'll bring my dogs
